alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 23 at 3:20AM MST until December 23 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING ABOVE 8000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 8000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. There will be a break in the snow through mid morning, but expect snow to increase again later in the morning through the afternoon. * WHERE...Areas above 8000 feet near Buffalo Pass, Ganado and Window Rock. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Additional snow forecast from 3 AM Today to 8 PM Today: Buffalo Pass 2 to 4 inches Ganado 0 to 1 inches Window Rock 0 to 1 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
